Ive thanked you many times on several of your torrents. You are the King or Queen of xvids now for those of who rely on them. One question though, if you happen to see this. What converter do you normally use?

im not tranny dude:) not a queen haha

i use umile mostly.. if theres syncing problems
i manual edit it using virtualdub or avidemux.org
or i use them to fix headers or edit out ads
or sharpen or color it etc

i sometimes use avs converter 8 for dvd rips
and joining flash together

plus a few other tools for odd ball things

without re-coding stuff
